item.title: Getting to know vim
item.description: This will be one of those posts, that I hope grows often as I love to use vim, and especially love to write down what I learn in case I forget it in the future. Useful Shortcuts Disable Search Highlighting set nohlsearch " Turn it off set hlsearch! " Toggle on or off :nohlsearch " Turn it off as command :nohl " Shorthand :noh " Even Shorter Useful Plugins TODO ;-)
